casebody.data:
No. 10-428. American Home Assurance Company, Petitioner v. UMG Recordings, Inc., et al. 562 U.S. 1006, 131 S. Ct. 543, 2010 U.S. LEXIS 8476.

178 L. Ed. 2d 375,

November 1, 2010.

Petition for writ of certiorari to the United States Court of Appeals for the Ninth Circuit denied.

Same case below, 378 Fed. Appx. 766.
